TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContractClassAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that a separate type contains the code contracts for this type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Types that are marked with this attribute have code contracts that are included in a separate type. The type that contains the contracts is specified in the constructor.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassAttribute> attribute to specify that the contracts for the `IArray` interface are contained in the `IArrayContracts` class.
[!code-csharp[ContractExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/contractexample/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ContractExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/contractexample/vb/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type typeContainingContracts) cil managed

Docs.param: The type that contains the code contracts for this type.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor to specify that the contracts for the `IArray` interface are contained in the `IArrayContracts` class.
[!code-csharp[ContractExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/contractexample/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ContractExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/contractexample/vb/program.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets the type that contains the code contracts for this type.
Docs.value: The type that contains the code contracts for this type.
